feed.title: Últimas Noticias de Fórmula 1 -ATOM-
feed.subtitle: Descubre las últimas noticias, actualizaciones y análisis sobre el mundo de la Fórmula 1, incluyendo resultados de carreras, fichajes y más.

entry.title: IN NUMBERS: The incredible figures behind seven seasons of Drive to Survive
entry.summary: Formula 1 fans get to enjoy a post-testing treat this week as the seventh season of Drive to Survive lands on Netflix. But just how much goes into producing a show that follows all 10 teams and 20 drivers around the world year in, year out? With help from the talented team at production company Box To Box, F1.com runs through some key numbers…
entry.content: Formula 1 fans get to enjoy a post-testing treat this week as the seventh season of Drive to Survive lands on Netflix. But just how much goes into producing a show that follows all 10 teams and 20 drivers around the world year in, year out? With help from the talented team at production company Box To Box, F1.com runs through some key numbers…

entry.title: ‘We had one shot to get it right’ – Susie Wolff on the ‘F1 ACADEMY effect’ and the crucial next steps for the future
entry.summary: Changing perceptions of a woman’s place in motorsport and funnelling the next generation of female talent towards Formula 1 was never going to be an overnight fix.
entry.content: Changing perceptions of a woman’s place in motorsport and funnelling the next generation of female talent towards Formula 1 was never going to be an overnight fix.
